question: Which of the following statements is true?
option1: A food chain is always unidirectional
option2: A food web is never unidirectional
explanation: A food chain refers to linear link among species that depend on each other for their food. It moves from lower tropic level to higher trophic level. Thus it is unidirectional. A food web is made up of many food chains connected together. Thus it is multi- directional
